title: Riot is the best!
body:
Riot is awesome coming up with all these new champions, skins, rebuilding the forums, and even awarding players for not receiving a ban. This hopefully will help the summoners actually want to be a respectful player and follow the summoners code. This is a great way to reward players who have been following the rules. Keep up the good work. 
                         Sincerely, 
                                           Random summoner {{champion:55}} 
Received Red Card Kat :D
